### enum  {#adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>enum llvm::jitlink::aarch64::EdgeKind_aarch64 : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/edge/#af18145da213e6c4033b368d657e80baa">Edge::Kind</a></>}>
Represents <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/aarch64">aarch64</a> fixups and other aarch64-specific edge kinds.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043a9f6ab8a0d2f19948762b78f6d6c5f562" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Pointer64">
A plain 64-bit pointer value relocation (= Edge::FirstRelocation)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043a109802d2cdabf31aaf8cb2aeac27547a" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Pointer64Authenticated">
An arm64e authenticated pointer relocation
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043aad97367a7201c67ade1c6d15c96f0746" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Pointer32">
A plain 32-bit pointer value relocation
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043aa43de9079a03e5cf7ea9c96de2956a47" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Delta64">
A 64-bit delta
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043a8d7dc75674b3fc58ba929cbef0217e4b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Delta32">
A 32-bit delta
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043adec7252c806dda04339c709cd9aec6e0" />
<EnumerationListItem name="NegDelta64">
A 64-bit negative delta
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043ade36f74cb3bddd6f86b25f96238033c3" />
<EnumerationListItem name="NegDelta32">
A 32-bit negative delta
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043a71c601f1339f93bc2c5fea1e3a225985" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Branch26PCRel">
A 26-bit PC-relative branch
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043acb7c5eaf3ed95ac3a2b5dadcccd86829" />
<EnumerationListItem name="TestAndBranch14PCRel">
A 14-bit PC-relative test and branch
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043a3bd47a01bb7612390e36cca6b1412b28" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CondBranch19PCRel">
A 19-bit PC-relative conditional branch
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043abee974069f5d980fe119624159e787fe" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MoveWide16">
A 16-bit slice of the target address (which slice depends on the instruction at the fixup location)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043a0014e81d3ba9092cf8b528e9c4976509" />
<EnumerationListItem name="LDRLiteral19">
The signed 21-bit delta from the fixup to the target
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043acded784063fe1cacf961152240dbfe8c" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ADRLiteral21">
The signed 21-bit delta from the fixup to the target
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043a69369335041eac416a42ce8fd039d38e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Page21">
The signed 21-bit delta from the fixup page to the page containing the target
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043af73aef9a424551ef1049e0bcb3e71ac1" />
<EnumerationListItem name="PageOffset12">
The 12-bit (potentially shifted) offset of the target within its page
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043ab6bafbc8841c3ff8d19e709ef4b71609" />
<EnumerationListItem name="GotPageOffset15">
The 15-bit offset of the GOT entry from the GOT table
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043acdbf75e478b336cc041c86d8c4ec2a81" />
<EnumerationListItem name="RequestGOTAndTransformToPage21">
A GOT entry getter/constructor, transformed to Page21 pointing at the GOT entry for the original target
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043ad9a0f2806d0a2a90cd99edc0e54caf10" />
<EnumerationListItem name="RequestGOTAndTransformToPageOffset12">
A GOT entry getter/constructor, transformed to Pageoffset12 pointing at the GOT entry for the original target
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043a10e93e2b017fdd1a792986be9fec69f4" />
<EnumerationListItem name="RequestGOTAndTransformToPageOffset15">
A GOT entry getter/constructor, transformed to Pageoffset15 pointing at the GOT entry for the original target
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="adaafb311352b6b70437034d62373d043ae6ed0aefe60a60c482de8fde088bba9b" />

A GOT entry getter/constructor, transformed to Delta32 pointing at the GOT entry for the original target

### createAnonymousPointer() {#ab246c2fa3507148bda940a4f0f680f68}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Symbol &amp; llvm::jitlink::aarch64::createAnonymousPointer (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp; G, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/section">Section</a> &amp; PointerSection, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol">Symbol</a> &#42; InitialTarget=nullptr, uint64&#95;t InitialAddend=0)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Creates a new pointer block in the given section and returns an Anonymous symbol pointing to it.

If InitialTarget is given then an Pointer64 relocation will be added to the block pointing at InitialTarget.

The pointer block will have the following default values: alignment: 64-bit alignment-offset: 0 address: highest allowable (~7U)

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/aarch64-h/#l00721">721</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/aarch64-h">aarch64.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createAnonymousPointerJumpStub() {#afea59b722159d204506a5a02667bdfe8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Symbol &amp; llvm::jitlink::aarch64::createAnonymousPointerJumpStub (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp; G, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/section">Section</a> &amp; StubSection, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol">Symbol</a> &amp; PointerSymbol)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Create a jump stub that jumps via the pointer at the given symbol and an anonymous symbol pointing to it.

Return the anonymous symbol.

The stub block will be created by createPointerJumpStubBlock.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/aarch64-h/#l00750">750</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/aarch64-h">aarch64.h</a>.

### createEmptyPointerSigningFunction() {#a8b6a1311d66ca584dd828968ec269156}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::jitlink::aarch64::createEmptyPointerSigningFunction (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp; G)</>}>
Creates a pointer signing function section, block, and symbol to reserve space for a signing function for this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a>.

Clients should insert this pass in the post-prune phase, and add the paired lowerPointer64AuthEdgesToSigningFunction pass to the pre-fixup phase.

No new Pointer64Auth edges can be inserted into the graph between when this pass is run and when the pass below runs (since there will not be sufficient space reserved in the signing function to write the signing code for them).

Clients should insert this pass in the post-prune phase, and add the paired lowerPointer64AuthEdgesToSigningFunction pass to the pre-fixup phase.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/aarch64-cpp/#l00233">233</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/aarch64-cpp">aarch64.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createPointerJumpStubBlock() {#aaa9c9aa1ac7e99b9934a23fd0b4702e1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Block &amp; llvm::jitlink::aarch64::createPointerJumpStubBlock (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp; G, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/section">Section</a> &amp; StubSection, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol">Symbol</a> &amp; PointerSymbol)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Create a jump stub block that jumps via the pointer at the given symbol.

The stub block will have the following default values: alignment: 32-bit alignment-offset: 0 address: highest allowable: (~11U)

### lowerPointer64AuthEdgesToSigningFunction() {#a92e5f360eac04874168e30f0df2bc5bb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::jitlink::aarch64::lowerPointer64AuthEdgesToSigningFunction (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp; G)</>}>
Given a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> containing Pointer64Authenticated edges, transform those edges to Pointer64 and add signing code to the pointer signing function (which must already have been created by the createEmptyPointerSigningFunction pass above).

Given a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> containing Pointer64Auth edges, transform those edges to Pointer64 and add code to sign the pointers in the executor.

This function will add a $&#95;&#95;ptrauth&#95;sign section with finalization-lifetime containing an anonymous function that will sign all pointers in the graph. An allocation action will be added to run this function during finalization.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/aarch64-cpp/#l00287">287</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/aarch64-cpp">aarch64.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
